5a13845c8bf55085c847973c.description:
+25 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: +10 Lethality
UNIQUE Passive: +20 Movement Speed out of Combat.
5a13845c8bf55085c847973c.name: Serrated Dirk

5a13845c8bf55085c847973e.description:
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 25 gold or 15% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item and upgrade to Nomad's Medallion.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and you receive an Elixir Of Skill.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''Gold dust rises from the desert and clings to the coin.'' - Historian Shurelya, 11 November, 23 CLE
5a13845c8bf55085c847973e.name: Ancient Coin

5a13845c8bf55085c847973a.description:
+10 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: +20 Movement Speed out of Combat
UNIQUE Passive: After poaching 3 large monsters from the enemy jungle (50 second cooldown), transforms into a Serrated Dirk.
5a13845c8bf55085c847973a.name: Poacher's Dirk

5a13845d8bf55085c8479743.description:
+55 Attack Damage
+35 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive: +15 Lethality
UNIQUE Passive: +20 Movement Speed out of Combat
UNIQUE Active - Night's Veil: Channel for 1.5 second to grant a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability. Lasts for 5 seconds (45 second cooldown).

(Can move while channeling, but taking damage breaks the channel.)
5a13845d8bf55085c8479743.name: Edge of Night

5a13845d8bf55085c8479741.description:
+60 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: +15 Lethality
UNIQUE Passive: +20 Movement Speed out of Combat
UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown).
5a13845d8bf55085c8479741.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade

5a13845c8bf55085c847973b.description:
+65 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: +15 Lethality
UNIQUE Passive: +20 Movement Speed out of Combat.
UNIQUE Passive - Nightstalker: After being unseen for at least 1 second, your next Basic Attack against an enemy champion will deal 75 (+200% Lethality) true damage on-hit (lasts for 4 seconds after being seen by an enemy champion).
UNIQUE Passive - Blackout: When spotted by an enemy ward, causes a blackout for 8 seconds, revealing invisible traps and revealing / disabling wards (90 second cooldown).
5a13845c8bf55085c847973b.name: Duskblade of Draktharr

5a13845d8bf55085c8479744.description:
+350 Health
+60 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: -20% damage taken from basic attack critical strikes.
UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15% for 1 second.
UNIQUE Active: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units by 55% for 2 seconds (60 second cooldown).
5a13845d8bf55085c8479744.name: Randuin's Omen

5a13845d8bf55085c847973f.description:
+100 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects magic damage back to the attacker equal to 25% of your bonus Armor plus 15% of the incoming damage.

(Bonus Armor is Armor from items, buffs, runes and masteries.)
(Reflect damage is calculated based on damage taken before being reduced by Armor.)
5a13845d8bf55085c847973f.name: Thornmail

+50% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.

5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33d.tooltip: Removes all disables from Alistar. For {{ e1 }} seconds Alistar takes {{ e2 }}% reduced physical and magical damage.
5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33d.name: Unbreakable Will
5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33d.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.

5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33c.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33c.tooltip: Readies a beam of starlight that, after {{ e3 }} second, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and stuns enemies for {{ e2 }} second(s).
5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33c.name: Dazzle

5a1385fe8bf55085c847d345.description: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.
5a1385fe8bf55085c847d345.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for {{ e4 }} seconds.
5a1385fe8bf55085c847d345.name: Crescent Strike

5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33f.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33f.tooltip:
Rammus enters a defensive formation for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}/{{ f2 }}) but becoming slowed by {{ e5 }}%.

During this time, Spiked Shell deals {{ e4 }}% damage and also deals its damage to enemies that basic attack Rammus.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Defensive Ball Curl on cooldown.
Casting Defensive Ball Curl cancels Powerball and puts it on cooldown.
5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33f.name: Defensive Ball Curl

5a1385fd8bf55085c847d340.tooltip: Toggle: Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*4 }}) magic damage per second.
5a1385fd8bf55085c847d340.name: Poison Trail
5a1385fd8bf55085c847d340.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33b.description:
Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored.

Bravado-empowered attacks reduce this recharge time more than usual.
5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33b.tooltip:
Spends all charges to heal nearby allied champions for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) per charge, up to {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) at 3 charges.

Bravado-empowered attacks reduce this recharge time by {{ f3 }} additional seconds.
5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33b.name: Starlight's Touch

5a1385fb8bf55085c847d339.description: Cho'Gath's attacks passively release deadly spikes, dealing damage to all enemy units in front of him.
5a1385fb8bf55085c847d339.tooltip: Toggle: Basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and apply spell effects. Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.
5a1385fb8bf55085c847d339.name: Vorpal Spikes

5a1385fe8bf55085c847d346.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
5a1385fe8bf55085c847d346.tooltip:
Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

Grants a temporary shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).
5a1385fe8bf55085c847d346.name: Pale Cascade

5a1385fd8bf55085c847d341.tooltip:
Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds, slowing enemies in the area by {{ e1 }}%.

If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.
5a1385fd8bf55085c847d341.name: Mega Adhesive
5a1385fd8bf55085c847d341.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing enemies who walk on it.

5a1385fd8bf55085c847d343.tooltip:
Passive: Killing units permanently grants {{ f2 }} armor and magic resist, up to a maximum of {{ e3 }}. Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Garen gains a defensive shield for {{ e4 }} seconds, reducing incoming damage by {{ e2 }}%.
5a1385fd8bf55085c847d343.name: Courage
5a1385fd8bf55085c847d343.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to grant himself a shield that reduces incoming damage for a short time.

5a1385fa8bf55085c847d336.tooltip:
Yorick summons The Maiden of the Mist and {{ e1 }} Mist Walkers. The Maiden has {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health, deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage, and raises Mist Walkers from nearby enemy deaths.

When Yorick damages the Maiden's target he will deal {{ e5 }}% of their max Health as bonus magic damage ({{ e7 }} second cooldown).

If the Maiden is summoned inside a lane, she will start pushing the lane.
5a1385fa8bf55085c847d336.name: Eulogy of the Isles
5a1385fa8bf55085c847d336.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.

5a1385fd8bf55085c847d344.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ f3 }} physical damage to nearby enemies -- {{ e1 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of his attack damage (+{{ f1 }}), {{ f2 }} times (increased by 1 every 3 champion levels) -- over the duration.

Enemy champions hit by {{ e6 }} spins lose {{ e5 }}% of their armor for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Judgment deals {{ e4 }}% increased damage when striking only one enemy.
Cancelling Judgment returns cooldown equal to the remaining duration.
Judgment can critically strike for bonus damage.
5a1385fd8bf55085c847d344.name: Judgment
5a1385fd8bf55085c847d344.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.

5a1385fe8bf55085c847d348.description: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
5a1385fe8bf55085c847d348.tooltip:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.
5a1385fe8bf55085c847d348.name: Lunar Rush

5a1385fb8bf55085c847d338.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
5a1385fb8bf55085c847d338.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} seconds and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.
5a1385fb8bf55085c847d338.name: Feral Scream

5a1385fb8bf55085c847d337.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
5a1385fb8bf55085c847d337.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for {{ e5 }} second, take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a1385fb8bf55085c847d337.name: Rupture

5a1385fb8bf55085c847d33a.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
5a1385fb8bf55085c847d33a.tooltip:
Ravenously feed on an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) true damage to champions or {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) to minions and monsters. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain {{ e3 }} maximum health.

  • Only {{ e4 }} total stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic monsters. (Current: {{ f3 }}/{{ e4 }})
5a1385fb8bf55085c847d33a.name: Feast

5a1385fa8bf55085c847d335.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
5a1385fa8bf55085c847d335.tooltip:
Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that deals {{ e7 }}% of enemy's current Health as magic damage (minimum {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})), slows by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds, and marks champions and monsters for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Yorick and his minions are hasted by {{ e5 }}% while moving toward the mark.
5a1385fa8bf55085c847d335.name: Mourning Mist

5a1385fe8bf55085c847d347.tooltip: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and then slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.
5a1385fe8bf55085c847d347.name: Moonfall
5a1385fe8bf55085c847d347.description: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies.

5a1385fd8bf55085c847d342.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for {{ e2 }} seconds.
5a1385fd8bf55085c847d342.name: Insanity Potion
5a1385fd8bf55085c847d342.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.

5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33e.description: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.
5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33e.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage to enemy Champions marks them for the next {{ e6 }} seconds.

Active: Rek'Sai lets out a harrowing scream before burrowing underground seeking out a marked target. Moments later she leaps from underground, dealing {{ e8 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage plus {{ e9 }}% of their missing Health.
5a1385fc8bf55085c847d33e.name: Void Rush

5a1385288bf55085c847c5aa.description: Removes all disables (excluding suppression) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
5a1385288bf55085c847c5aa.name: Cleanse

5a1385288bf55085c847c5ab.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic or large monster or enemy minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters.
5a1385288bf55085c847c5ab.name: Smite

5a13876c8bf55085c847fd1f.description: Gains Attack Speed. Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage.
5a13876c8bf55085c847fd1f.name: Moonsilver Blade

5a13876c8bf55085c847fd1e.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his maximum health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.
5a13876c8bf55085c847fd1e.name: Perseverance

5a13876c8bf55085c847fd1d.description: Increases Singed's Health by 25 for every 100 Mana he has.
5a13876c8bf55085c847fd1d.name: Empowered Bulwark
